ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] evaluationOutcome with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] evaluationReason with data type Code
Contains zero or more [0..*] vaccinationEvent, where its type is Vaccination Event
Contains zero or more [0..*] targetDose, where its type is Target Dose Number
